import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

X_train = pd.read_csv('../input/student-performance-data-set-competition-form/X_train.csv')

y_train = pd.read_csv('../input/student-performance-data-set-competition-form/y_train.csv')

cols = ['school','sex','age','address','famsize','Pstatus','Mjob','Fjob','reason','guardian','schoolsup','famsup','paid','activities','nursery','higher','internet','romantic']

source.dacfbcc8:
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
model = XGBRegressor(n_estimators = 400, learning_rate = 0.1, max_depth=3, min_samples_split=4, min_samples_leaf=3)
model.fit(X_train_val, y_train_val)
pred_test = model.predict(X_test_val)

from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
r2_score(y_test_val, pred_test)
